access: Domio guests have access to the building's state of the art fitness center. In the summer, guests can enjoy the relaxing outdoor rooftop pool.
description:
Enjoy scenic city views in this 2 bedroom/2 Bath apartment in Old Town. This space comes with modern amenities such as a roof top lounge area and fitness center. Here you’ll find all the comforts of home: full kitchen, custom artwork, and furnishings curated to reflect the beauty of the Windy City. There are also restaurants and bars just about 10 min walk. Come stay with us at this beautiful Domio and experience the best that Chicago has to offer.

This space captures the essence of style and comfort, which is what Domio is all about. This 2 bedroom / 2 bath duplex boasts a spacious living room, hand-picked furniture, and radiant finishes. In addition to a fully stocked kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances, guests will be pleased to find lively decor and artwork throughout the apartment. The first bedroom features a queen size bed and the second bedroom has 2 full beds.

Domio guests have access to the building's state of the art fitness center. In the summer, guests can enjoy the relaxing outdoor rooftop pool.

Old Town is charming and historic area known for its restaurants and cafes. Pick up fresh produce from the seasonal Green City Market. Attractions that are less than a 15 minute walk include the Lincoln Park Zoo, Chicago History Museum, and North Ave Beach.

Chicago Registration Number: R19000046635

Washer and Dryer is located in the building, not in the unit.

Please note that we do not allow bookings from residents of Chicago and surrounding areas.

description:
★ 2 Bedroom Apartment about 700 square feet (65 square meters) with 12 feet heigh ceilings (3.6 meters)
★ PARKING! We have our own parking, please ask if you need!
★ Short walk to Mexican and Italian restaurants
★ Quiet neighborhood with quick and easy transportation options to downtown
★ 7 min walking to Damen Pink line (0.4 mile)
★ 20 min to downtown by public transit
★ 10 min Uber ride to downtown

★ Flexible check-in/out
★ Lots of Natural Light
★ Located on the quite street

You have access to the entire unit.

I can provide individual guidance when my schedule permits.  Regardless, I will always provide advice on the best places to experience the beauty of Chicago.   Just let me know what you need!

This great little neighborhood is called Pilsen. It was named after the city Plzeň by Czech Immigrants who arrived in the late 1800's. The location is known for great Mexican restaurants and is within walking distance to the Heart of Italy for great Italian food.

Free Street Parking is available near the building. 

Train Line:
Pink Line - 10 Minute Walk to Either Western or Damen Stations.  
-~20 min to Morgan/Lake Station (West Loop Area known for Great Food and Bars)
-~25 min to Clark/Lake  Station (i.e. the "Loop" or downtown)

Bus Lines:
49 (Western) & X49  (Western Express) - 7 min walk to nearest stop
21 (Cermak) - 3 min walk to nearest stop
60 (Blue Island) - 5 min walk to nearest stop
8 (Damen) - 5 min walk to nearest stop

~30-35 Min to/from Midway via Public Transit (Less than 20 min via Taxi/Uber)

Please remember that you are staying in a house, not a hotel. Please treat the space with respect. If any problems arise, we will do our best to take action ASAP, but there is no one living on-site 24/7.

additional_house_rules:
General Rules
-Please treat the home as if it is your own.
-Please respect our guest limit capacity of 3 people.
-Do not engage in illegal activities anywhere on the property.
-If you accidentally damage anything during your stay, please contact the host for your safety and the future safety of the next guest.
-We pride ourselves on being green and would appreciate you turning off the TV and lights when you check-out.
-Please remember to sign out of any ROKU apps you utilized via your personal accounts before departing.

Quiet Hours
Quiet hours are between 10p-8a.
This is a residential building and ask that for the respect of permanent tenants basic courtesies of being mindful of your noise levels and not congregating in hallways outside of the unit be observed.

Receiving a noise complaint from the building or the device can result in the forfeiture of your stay and a $1000 fine. 

No Smoking
The home (and entire building including outdoor common areas) is designated as a strictly smoke-free community. There will be a $500 fee imposed if you choose to smoke in the building. Please respect our policy and step outside the vicinity.

Key Fob
The key fob is your way of accessing everything from your short-stay apartment to the amenity spaces in the building. If you happen to lose your key fob, you will be charged $75. 

Security
Please be advised that the building exterior and common spaces are equipped with surveillance devices. Please respect the building and its community. 

Emergencies
Contact your host immediately with any issues. An emergency maintenance number is provided in the home guide for any building issues that involve water or hazards in the home.

For medical, fire and police related emergencies please call 911.

access:
The entire home is yours to enjoy for the duration of your stay. You will also have access to all of the building's beautiful and unique amenities.

Parking
There is no dedicated parking space for the home. We recommend using apps like SpotHero to locate discounted street or garage spots nearby.
description:
Welcome to JENNEY JOY, a beautiful studio with luxury amenities. Lounge on the roof top and take in the skyline views or sweat it out namaste style in the yoga room . The rooftop includes Insta-worthy views, fire pits for rosé days, and plenty of space to host your friends. This urban enclave is built for you!

Sleeping Arrangements
Living Room -  1 Queen Bed & Fold Down Sleeper Sofa (Full)

Kitchen  
The kitchen is fully equipped with pots, pants, utensils, silverware, plates, bowls, cups, knives, a cutting board, salt and pepper, a coffee maker, and cream and sugar – for however you take it.  
 
Cleaning Supplies  
You’re supplied with dish soap, a sponge, dish detergent and paper towels.

Washer/Dryer 
There is a washer/dryer in unit. We provide you with detergent for your stay!

TV
The Roku guide is posted next to the TV. There is also a digital antenna for local channels. Please remember to sign out of any of any Roku apps you’ve utilize during your stay. 

Non-Smoking 
The home and entire building is designated as a smoke-free community. There will be a $500 fee imposed if you choose to smoke in unit or the building. Please respect our policy and step outside.

Deck
Enjoy access to the spacious roof-top lounge & deck complete with seating area, grills, and views of the skyline!

Parking
There is no dedicated parking space for the home. We recommend using apps like SpotHero to locate discounted street or garage spots nearby.

Noise 
Potential for noise - You can hear the train and other city noises from the unit.

The entire home is yours to enjoy for the duration of your stay. You will also have access to all of the building's beautiful and unique amenities.

Parking
There is no dedicated parking space for the home. We recommend using apps like SpotHero to locate discounted street or garage spots nearby.

We are off-site but available when needed. The best way to reach us is by emailing reservations@livly.io!  In case of maintenance emergency, the in-unit home guide will detail phone numbers of who to call immediately.

The Loop is the official downtown area of Chicago! This area is buzzing with a lively atmosphere, stunning architecture and many of Chicago's famous landmarks.

The area features some of Chicago’s cultural attractions such as the Chicago Cultural Center, Art Institute of Chicago and Theatre District! There is also no shortage of award-winning restaurants and shopping in the area.

Let’s not forget the incredible outdoor spaces that the Loop has to offer! The “Bean” is located in the famed Millennium Park, the perfect place to relax during a Chicago summer day. There are also the newly added Chicago Riverwalk and Maggie Daley Park!

There is no dedicated parking space for the home. We recommend using apps like SpotHero to locate discounted street or garage spots nearby.

The home is a 2 minute walk from the CTA brown, red, purple & pink line trains at the "LaSalle/Van Buren" stop. This train line will take you all over the city, including into the neighborhoods further north and south for exploring or transfer to another train line.

Check In / Check Out
Check in starts at 4 PM CT
Check out time is 11 AM CT

We do not offer early Check In or late Check Out. 

Luggage Hold 
If your travel arrangements have you arriving earlier or leaving later than our designated check in / check out times, we recommend using Wait Here Chicago. We have a partnership with them and can offer you discounted rates on their luggage hold options throughout the city.

access: Guests are welcomed to sit at the kitchen table or porch for meals or just to get out of the room and work on their laptops. I will make space in the larger fridge for your food. You may use the microwave oven for heating take home food. To keep pests away we have a "No food is allowed in the bedroom" rule. There is a door dividing the kitchen and front areas of the apartment that can be closed for your added privacy.
description:
This apartment offers both a quiet space for relaxation yet it is within walking distance (2-3 minutes) from a bustling restaurant, bar, and shopping strip as well as an active art and music scene. 

The 'Square' in "Logan Square" is a park with benches where visitors can sit and observe the day or night life along Milwaukee Ave. Logan Square definitely accommodates walkers, runners, and bikers. It is a short distance from the "606", an elevated train track converted into a park.

The bedroom is small and cozy. There are two windows that provide cross ventilation during warm nights. The bedroom door leads out onto a private porch where you can sit and enjoy the garden view with a refreshing drink.

Guests are welcomed to sit at the kitchen table or porch for meals or just to get out of the room and work on their laptops. I will make space in the larger fridge for your food. You may use the microwave oven for heating take home food. To keep pests away we have a "No food is allowed in the bedroom" rule. There is a door dividing the kitchen and front areas of the apartment that can be closed for your added privacy.

If you are coming in from O'Hare, you can hop on the blue-line subway and get off at the Logan Square Station, exit Kedzie Avenue. The apartment is only a 5-ten minute walk away.

Logan square is a wonderful combination of old and new. You can enjoy a stroll through the community garden and boulevard. During the summer months it hosts various festivals, art fairs, and a farmer's market. It is home to the Logan Theatre (movie house) on Milwaukee Avenue...a strip of art galleries, restaurants, and bars. If you walk further south on Milwaukee you will run into Wicker Park, a neighborhood with it's own cultural scene.

This space is in the heart of Logan Square...a walker's and biker's paradise. You can walk, take the bus, take the train, or rent a bike to get around. All these are within a 5 or ten minute walk from the space. If you are driving, there is usually street parking available.

There is a map of Chicago on the backdoor of the kitchen and some booklets on the bookshelf. There is also a public library 2 blocks full of valuable information for tourists. We also have a health food coop where you can purchase organic food and during the spring and summer months, a farmers market just around the corner on the boulevard. I am available throughout the day to help with any questions and concerns.
house_rules:
Quiet hours are from 10p to 6a
Eating and drinking  in the bedroom is discouraged

description:
Beautiful 20th Century Victorian in Chicago's Irving Park Neighborhood. Centrally located in a quite treelined street. 15 min from downtown and O'hare International Airport. Massive living rooom, dining room and outdoor space. List price is for 1 bedroom only, up to 7 bedrooms available.

Anytime

Originally planned as a suburb of Chicago in the 1870s, the quaint, quiet northwestern pocket was annexed in 1889. Today, Irving Park is known for its picturesque Victorians and large lots, giving the neighborhood a traditional residential feel minutes away from Chicago's nightlife, touristic destinations and great restaurants.

Easy access to public transportation and major highway.

access: Our guests are free to help themselves to any areas of the condo except for our bedroom and office. Other than that feel free to use anything in the kitchen, laundry room, relax in the living room and watch T.V. or hang out on our large back deck. We have space set aside in the refrigerator and pantry if you want to buy any groceries or cook while you are here. We basically view our airbnb guests as short term roommates, so make yourself at home :)
description:
Private room in the heart of Wicker Park/Bucktown area! My husband Kevin and I live in the condo and rent out our second bedroom part-time for extra money while we are finishing our degrees. Currently we are only accepting shorter reservations of 2 weeks or less. Our condo is very clean, comfortable, and in a great neighborhood within a few minutes walking distance to the Damen blue line stop, lots of shopping, bars, and restaurants. Please feel free to send a message if you have any questions.

We try to make our guests feel as comfortable as possible and provide you with as many amenities as we can, and help you with any information you may need for getting around, good restaurants, shopping places, etc.. We use airbnb when I travel so I know what I look for and try to accommodate my guests to provide as much comfort as I possibly can. The room has a full size comfortable bed with a desk and a chair and a closet with hangers. Just to keep in mind if you have trouble with stairs, there is a flight and a half of stairs to get up to my condo with no elevator.

Our guests are free to help themselves to any areas of the condo except for our bedroom and office. Other than that feel free to use anything in the kitchen, laundry room, relax in the living room and watch T.V. or hang out on our large back deck. We have space set aside in the refrigerator and pantry if you want to buy any groceries or cook while you are here. We basically view our airbnb guests as short term roommates, so make yourself at home :)

We are absolutely happy to help you with any information you may need. From good breweries and restaurants to transportation and shopping, We will help you as best as we can if you need it.

Wicker Park/Bucktown is an awesome area of Chicago. Very close to downtown with lots of cool restaurants, theaters, shopping, and bars, but still has a neighborhood feel. Our condo is very close to the main intersection but on a residential tree lined street that is a bit quieter.

Very close to the Damen Blue Line stop (about 5 minute walk). Also right between the North Ave. bus and the Milwaukee bus lines and near the Damen bus line.

We do have 2 indoor cats so you just need to watch for them and make sure not to leave doors to the outside open. They are both very sweet and friendly with people though so they may beg for some attention now and then. Also, currently we are only accepting shorter stays of no more than two weeks.

additional_house_rules:
House Rules

1. Reservations require a $400 security deposit that is not charged in advance.

2. Guests can cancel free of charge within 24 hours of booking (please contact us to process the refund). You’ll be charged 50% of the booking price (minus the service fee) if you cancel more than seven days before arrival, and 100% of the total price if you cancel within seven days of arrival.

3. Check-in is at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be available upon request. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

4. Guests are not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.

description:
Featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and Fast Company, we’ve hosted over 350k guests in 2,500+ spaces with an average rating of 4.6 stars. Each space is designed and run by us, so you’ll always know what to expect from your stay. At Sonder, we’ve combined the best parts of home and hotel.

- 24/7 support via text, email, or phone
- Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials provided
- Hotel-standard cleaning before you arrive
- Self check-in

- Fully-equipped kitchen
- In-suite laundry

Building amenities
- Rooftop patio
- Gym
- Club room

South Loop highlights
- Walkability score: 98
- 8 minute walk to Lou Malnati's Pizzeria (classic Chicago-style pizza restaurant)
- 10 minute walk to Buddy Guy's Legends (blues club with great cocktails)

Getting around
- 5 minute walk to LaSalle subway station
- .7 mile walk to Grant Park
- 50 minute drive to ORD Airport

The South Loop is a vibrant blend of notable attractions, beautiful parks, and stunning Lake Michigan views. Picnic in the charming green space surrounding Museum Campus, or attend one of the many events at Grant Park such as The Taste of Chicago. Spend the day exploring the countless museums, or journey to the top of the 108-story Willis Tower for breathtaking views of the city.

There are 7 steps once inside the building to get to the area with elevators.

There’s no cable. We’ve provided an HDMI cord for streaming.

The bedroom walls do not extend to the ceiling.

This is a central location and prone to noise.

description:
Beautiful one bedroom with lofted ceilings, modern appliances, and an open floor plan in downtown Chicago's vibrant and historic River North neighborhood.
All guests must be verified and have a government issued ID for check-in!

This luxurious suite creates the perfect centerpiece for any trip to Chicago, whether for business, pleasure, or both. Not only will you have an incredible view day and night, you will also be centrally located in a hub of all that Chicago has to offer in sightseeing, nightlife, arts, and entertainment. The unit is located in the heart of the city, very close to Michigan Ave., in a haven that has a reputation for being eclectic, interesting, artistic and tightly-woven.
This magnificent building also features a rooftop deck, lounge, business center,  pool table, and more. You will have a queen bed, and an air mattress within the unit, as well as a communal washer and dryer, and high speed wi-fi.

I travel a lot, but am always available for questions! Messaging me on Airbnb is always the best way to reach me.

Rock and roll Mcdonalds
Wildfire
Rockit Ranch
The Godfrey
Boss Bar
Hoooters
Catina Laredo
Maestros
Mercadito

28 min from ohare.There is a parking nearby. I always recommend using an app, such as SpotHero, to find discounted garage parking in the area :)

additional_house_rules:
1. No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable and subject to a $250 fine.
2. Please ensure that you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to the designated location by the agreed upon check-out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out penalty.
3. Absolutely no smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any entrance.
4. Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5. Pets are not allowed at the property.
6. Lockouts will result in a $150 fee per occurrence. Additionally, lost keys will incur a $150 per key fee.

access: You will have complete and private access to our condo.
description:
Our home is in a luxury building in a perfect location with amazing city views in every direction through its floor to ceiling windows. It's a spacious two bedroom and two bathroom apartment with an additional day bed and sofa sleeper, ideal for families or couples traveling together. You can easily reach anything you want to see in the city from here. I'm always happy to give recommendations!

Located in a secure, luxury building in the center of it all! Once you're inside, you're greeted by floor-to-ceiling windows on every wall. The views during the day are incredible - but it's even more magical at night! Right out the window, you'll see a unique scene of diverse and historic Chicago architecture with the bustling city below. 

Everything is top of line and interior design is a passion of mine - so the furnishing of the unit reflects that! There is blazing fast internet, a smart TV with Roku, and comfortable modern furniture to lounge on. 

The kitchen and living room are open and each of the two bedrooms has its own luxury bathroom.

The kitchen is stocked with top of the line cookware and all the tools you need to stay in and cook a great meal if you wish. 

Plus - we have a 6 person dining room table and 3 counter stools for the kitchen island. Plenty of room for all guests to dine comfortably. 

For each guest, the comfortable beds have fresh, clean and crisp linens and the bathrooms are stocked with fresh towels and bath products from Malin + Goetz. 

I also provide towels and detergent, iron etc. and you have full access to the in-unit washer and dryer!

You will have complete and private access to our condo.

From our location, you can easily walk to Millennium Park, the lakefront, the Chicago River, the Magnificent Mile, the Art Institute and so much more. The Field Museum, Shedd Aquarium, and Soldier Field are just a 5 minute ride. Oak Street for luxury shopping and the West Loop restaurant row for would class dining are only 5 minutes away as well!

Our place is surrounded by trains and buses that will take you anywhere in the city you want to go! Uber and Lyft is also available 24/7. You'll have no trouble getting around without a car.

Parking is not included with our listing, but there are many nearby parking garages close to our building (within a couple blocks). We also suggest using SpotHero or ParkWhiz to find and book discounted parking. You can usually find very reasonable overnight parking for $15 to $25.

additional_house_rules:
1. Please replace your shoes at the entrance. 

2. Quiet time is after 10:00pm and before 8:00am. Including kitchen. 

3. Kitchen is shared. Just LIGHT COOKING once or twice per week is acceptable,  like boiling, heating etc.  And clean afterwards. Baking like turkeys and breads with powder are not allowed.  Heavy cooking are not welcome. 

4. Washer and dryer are downstairs and free.  Usually provide once a week.  Please DONOT treat as a laundry store.  And please follow the notice on the dryer.

5. Please don’t leave expensive and important things in the room if you mind.  And for some emergency or service, we keep the right to enter the rooms.

6. Anything please turn on and turn off. Open and close.

For long term guests:

1. Because you will get the long term(over 28 days)price.  What you paid is not included the body wash, shampoo, toilet paper, and etc.  But you still will see everything when you arrive. Just to welcome you. 

2. Here is airbnb.  Not an entire apartment by contract. We are shared.  We have no contract and no deposit. You have to pay first, stay later.  Without pay you have no right to enter the place or keep your stuffs in my rooms.   Also you can decide how long you need to stay and let us know in advance so we can block for you . The same we also have the right to decide how long to host you and let you know in advance . And we keep the right to enter the room for keeping the whole place safe or for some repairs while your stay even there is a keypad lock on each door. Commonly we will not enter your room without notice you. 

Once you decide to stay , that means you agree with all these and will follow the rules of our place.

For long term guests:

1. Because you will get the long term(over 28 days)price.  What you paid is not included the body wash, shampoo, toilet paper, and etc.  But you still will see everything when you arrive. Just to welcome you. 

2. Here is airbnb.  Not an entire apartment by contract. We are shared.  We have no contract and no deposit. You have to pay first, stay later.  Without pay you have no right to enter the place or keep your stuffs in my rooms.   Also you can decide how long you need to stay and let us know in advance so we can block for you . The same we also have the right to decide how long to host you and let you know in advance . And we keep the right to enter the room for keeping the whole place safe or for some repairs while your stay even there is a keypad lock on each door. Commonly we will not enter your room without notice you. 

Once you decide to stay , that means you agree with all these and will follow the rules of our place.

description:
Welcome to Chicago! 

Michael and I felt in love with this city, the lake, the buildings, the city. 
So we decided to stay and share our home for travelers like you! 

Close to downtown chicago/ McCormick Center.
Walking distance to public transportation.

❤️ Guaranteed parking 24/7 for free. ❤️
@ 1st floor

- New bed and towels for every guest!
- Walking distance to tons of great restaurants! Altantic Chinese foods! Milk tea, cafes! 
- To downtown Chicago, McCormick center, IIT, UIC and the Lake Michigan is less than 15 mins.
- Guaranteed free parking 24/7 at Canal in front of the house. 
***❤️The room is at 1st floor❤️***

I have many rooms fits all needs in 3 different places close by loop Chicago. 
Room1- big space with queen bed + sofa + twin bed 
Room2- big space with queen bed + sofa 
Room3- queen bed + a bed table 
Room4- queen bed + a desk 
Room5- queen bed + a desk 
Room6- queen bed + a desk 
Room7- queen bed + a desk 
Room8- queen bed + a desk   - (private 0.5 bathroom)
Room9- queen bed + a desk
Room10- full bed + a bed table 
Room11- queen bed + a desk + twin bed 

•••All rooms at the 1st floor •••
Click on my host profile picture and check all rooms. 

Special party:
-- If needed an additional twin bed for 3rd guest, could choose room 1/6/7/9 with $15 extra. 
(Need to notice me when reserving, so I could arrange it)
-- If needed a private bathroom, could book room 8.
-- If needed a private space & bathroom, could book room 3 and 4 together it's entire apartment. 
-- Early bird & late arrival / departure.
Anytime you arrive could check in with digital door and password. 
Each room has its own lock.
Luggage could storage in till before/ after check out. 
-- Any other special needs feel free to ask.

What to offer:
1- High speed internet
2- Make you easy meal in the gourmet kitchen with all supplies.
3- Inside the room
A real queen bed, new towels, desk, water, candies.
4- Outside the room:
Neat bathroom, new towels, soap, shampoo, slippers, iron, hair dryer, straighten, supplementary fruit, energy bar, candies etc.

Getting around: 
Uber to downtown $5 
Uber to MDW airport $15
Uber to ORD airport $25

Bus #62 to downtown.
Bus #44 stop is at the corner of the building.
Walking distance to Orange Train / Red Train. 7-11 mins. 
**Chicago bus and train are from the same company call CTA
** You could online search their schedule. 
**Cost 2.25 transfer for free.

Check in is flexible. 
Check in anytime with password to get in the house whenever you arrive.
* The room is ready to check in and out around 11am-11:30am. 
* House could still have access to such like living room/ bathroom/ kitchen. 
Cleaning staff come everyday at 11am to prepare the room for next guest.
You're welcome to stay whenever your schedule goes with. BUT, since my airbnb listing very full booked. 
Luggage will prefer to bring outside of the room, so that I could clean the room for the next guest! 
Thank you.

No loud music

description:
Arbor House is nested in a quiet, secure location centrally located residential neighborhood in a Suburb of Chicago in Naperville-Lisle Suburb.  Click profile to see other rooms at Arbor House.

The property is surrounded by 36-miles of Nature,  cycling/Jogging/walking trails and shopping centers. 

20 miles from Midway International Airport, and 24 miles from  O'Hare International Airport. 

We speak your language!  Arbor House *  Naperville-Lisle has been welcoming guests since Dec 2007.

Walking distance to Benedictine University...  other universities are with 3-5 miles... College of Dupage 3-miles,   North Central College, DeVry University, Robert Morris University.   8-minutes to Downtown Naperville... and the bi-centennial beach and river-walk. 

Just minutes from major business and shopping centers. 28-minutes to Chicago's Loop by Train & 35-minutes by car.

All areas except 1st floor private room, other guest rooms, basement and garage.

Host will meet guest to exchange access code & orientation.
Preferred method of contact; Airbnb Email

This home is surrounded by 36-miles of trails allow for hiking, jogging, or biking. Seventeen public parks offer facilities such as playgrounds, tennis courts, basketball courts, and ball fields.   Extensive common areas, jogging and biking throughout the private subdivision.  Golf, skiing and other activities nearby. The generously proportioned interior flows effortlessly from the living space to the patio and deck which you can admire the views of the garden and beyond into this residential neighborhood nestled around  nine lakes, mature woods, grassy open spaces, gentle hills and flatland. There are many recreational opportunities within the subdivision itself.  

Walking distance to Benedictine University...  other universities ar with 3-5 miles... College of Dupage 3-miles,   North Central College, DeVry University, Robert Morris University. 

Convenient to office complexes of the I-88 Corporate Corridor, and to commuter rail and highway networks connecting Chicago and surrounding suburbs.

Approximately 30 miles west of Chicago Loop, the area has quick access to Interstates 88 and 355 and public transportation is also available.  Nearby shopping, the Arboretum and other attractions.

10-Minutes from the Metrarail Station...
Grocery and shopping centers within minutes.
O'hare and Midway Airport 30-40 minutes away.

No Bare Feet-Indoor Footwear-All Household Zones including bedrooms. Complimentary slippers available.

20 miles from Midway International Airport, and 24 miles from  O'Hare International Airport. 

We speak your language!  Arbor House *  Naperville-Lisle has been welcoming guests since Dec 2007.
transit:
Approximately 30 miles west of Chicago Loop, the area has quick access to Interstates 88 and 355 and public transportation is also available.  Nearby shopping, the Arboretum and other attractions.

10-Minutes from the Metrarail Station...
Grocery and shopping centers within minutes.
O'hare and Midway Airport 30-40 minutes away.

description:
Private bath/bedroom (queen) located on a quiet street in a vibrant neighborhood close to downtown and the lake with easy public transportation 24/7. Wi-Fi provided. Friendly hosts who live in the same space will help make your stay exceptional!!

Private Room and Bathroom in an upscale condo in one of the most desirable Chicago neighborhoods

Location:
Quiet location; only 20 minutes from Chicago downtown and Loop by public transportation; convenient to major subway lines and many buses.

Major Nearby Attractions:
Halsted and Clark Streets' lively night life, lakefront running and biking path, Wrigley Field baseball park, many off-loop theaters, comedy, music and blues clubs, specialty restaurants, graystone and brownstone walk-up buildings and other historic architecture, trendy fashion outlets, wine boutiques and bars, chain stores and independent shops.

Public transportation is provided by the CTA's rapid transit train line with stations at Belmont and Addison on the Red Line, and Belmont on the Brown and Purple Lines. Numerous CTA bus routes also serve the district, as well as plentiful taxis and other transportation at all times.

About Us: 
We are a friendly couple of professionals who enjoy traveling, dining, and exercise. We love all the culture and activities that the city offers. We are fluent in Spanish and English. We will make you feel as if you were with family or at a friend's house. 

Our Condo:
We have heat, air conditioning, wireless internet and flat screen TV in the living room. During the summer months the building rooftop is a great area to lounge, take sun and barbeque.

Your Accommodation:
Queen size bed, closet, ceiling fan, private bathroom with bathtub, shower and hair dryer.

Food and Wine:
Good food and wine are very important for us. Antonio trained as a chef, and we love cooking healthy and delicious food and having great wine.

Depending on schedules, we're mostly available morning or night. We try to be available to answer questions or provide suggestions.

On a quiet street in a very active area full of bars, restaurants and stores.

5 minutes walk to the red, brown and purple train lines. Many buses including express ones downtown.

additional_house_rules:
Please, take shoes off in the house to minimize potential scratches.

Leave the property in same condition as your arrival. Load dishes in dishwasher, clean up spills, etc. 

Due to a special request, from a guest,  I am adding that guests are to communicate when they need special accommodations. For example, if you and your spouse or fiancé will not be sharing a bed/ room host needs to know of such special sleeping arrangements. Host assumes there is one bed per couple. 

Alert host of additional guests, there will be additional fee for guests not listed during initial booking.

No smoking on the premises.

No parties.

Thank you in advance!

description:
Lovely updated home just outside of Chicago. Quiet suburb with lots of cool and fun activities all around. Spacious enclosed backyard to have bonfires or bbq. Relax by the fireplace while it snows outside. Cook a delicious meal on the chefs stove with double oven- in case you’ll want to make warm sweet treats. Kids play room right off of the living area. 20 mins to Chicago by car or metra in homewood.

Make yourself feel at home.

Fee free to text or call me with questions or concerns. Always available.

Close to Tinley Park, Orland Park, Frankfort, Mokena. You’ll find plenty of neighborhood bars, libraries for the kids, restaurants and shopping. The cutest local neighbors have so much charm. Also, plenty of wildlife to see in the surrounding forest preserves. Watch out for deer!

You’ll need a car. You’ll have a two car garage to park in, as well as a driveway for any guests sleeping overnight. For street parking overnight you’ll need to call in your car.

access: Private roof deck, private parking garage (at the property) , 3 showers, 2 full kitchens, 4 bedrooms and 2 pull out queen size sofas!
description:
IDEAL FOR LARGE GROUPS!!!!

This is custom designed for groups of 10 - 20 people as it contains the following:

- You will have your own private floor and access to 2 individual Suites across the hall from each other.
- 10 total Queen beds.
- 3 FULL bathrooms 
- PRIVATE ROOF DECK ACCESS. This space is EXCLUSIVE for you and your guests and is the PERFECT spot to spend your days/nights (aweomse LED lighting at night).
- 2 car garage parking (we offer more parking if needed).
- 2 full kitchens

Perfect for:
Take a tour of both suites!
http://tour.mataramedia.com/mdtbfs/858-n-orleans-st-unit-2s-chicago-il.html
 http://tour.mataramedia.com/mdtbfs/858-n-orleans-st-unit-3n-chicago-il.html

- Corporate Housing
- Weddings
- Family reunions
- Bachelor/Bachelorette Parties
- Student Housing
- Large Groups

Private roof deck, private parking garage (at the property) , 3 showers, 2 full kitchens, 4 bedrooms and 2 pull out queen size sofas!

Our property is centrally located downtown in a VERY safe area.  We are perfect for group gatherings and family events!  We are literally located right downtown next to all of the high rise buildings and walking distance to everything.    

Walking Distance:  We are located around 5 blocks to The Loop and Magnificent Mile/Rush Street (shopping district), 3 blocks from the bar/restaurant scene in River North, 5 blocks to Gold Coast's Viagra Triangle (area filled with bars/restaurants), 6 blocks to Wells Street (party street filled with bars and restaurants), 10 blocks to the Beach.  If something is not within walking distance, Uber is a great option.  As we are centrally located, you can get virtually anywhere cheaply!

Public Transportation - Brown Line El (Chicago Stop):  We are located 1.5 blocks to the Chicago Brown Line stop.  This train can take you anywhere in the city.  It can get easily get you to and from both Ohare and Midway airports or shoot you up to Wrigley for the baseball game.

We have even MORE of these properties available at this SAME location. Simply ask me if you need more rooms and I will send you the links.

access: You have the whole apartment to yourself, but I am right upstairs if you need anything.
description:
Beautiful garden apartment in owner-occupied home on one of the prettiest blocks in Ukrainian Village.  You have the full apartment, including bedroom with full-sized bed, comfortable living room and dining area, a desk to work at, and a kitchenette perfect for making breakfast or snacks.

You have the whole apartment to yourself, but I am right upstairs if you need anything.

I’d love to chat with you while you are here.  I love giving advice on what to do in Chicago. If you hear me upstairs, feel free to stop up.  The best way is by coming outside to the back door.  Or just text me and I can stop down!

This is one of the hippest neighborhoods in the city.  There are tons of bars and restaurants within blocks.  I have some suggestions available in the apartment.

I am an easy walk from the Blue line — either the Damen or Division stop, depending on where you are coming from. If you drive, parking is not too bad.  My block doesn’t require a permit, and if you arrive during the day, there are almost always spaces. If you arrive after 6:00 pm, you might have to park a block or so away.
house_rules: Please wash any dishes if you use them and take off your shoes if it is mucky out. Thanks!

access:
Ever dreamed about jetting off to your own Chicago apartment? Well, now’s your chance to bring that fantasy to life. During your stay, the whole apartment is yours and only yours.

Please note that this unit is on the second floor of the building.
description:
Welcome to Chicago! Home of the World Series Champs, the Cubs. Our 2-bedroom/1-bathroom condo is the perfect place to stay in Chicago, whether travelling for business or vacation. It's professionally designed with modern furniture and a full kitchen.

Chill in our apartment with our complimentary coffee and tea! We also have basic condiments for your cooking needs.

Indeed, this is your home away from home!

In the heart of trendy Lakeview Chicago, our sophisticated 2 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment is the perfect launchpad for Windy City adventures or clinching that important business deal. Whatever brings you to town, you’ll rest easy in our charming, quiet neighborhood with easy access to the Red Line train

Ever dreamed about jetting off to your own Chicago apartment? Well, now’s your chance to bring that fantasy to life. During your stay, the whole apartment is yours and only yours.

Please note that this unit is on the second floor of the building.

We’re all about giving you plenty of privacy and personal space, so we’ll be available by phone (call or text) during your stay.

Lakeview is not only a local favorite but one of Chicago's traveller's top choices. A metropolitan area that will let you experience an exciting land and water attractions during your stay. The stretch of shoreline, different districts with its own unique vibe that offers nightly entertainment, shopping destinations and an award winning food joints and bars.

 
You will never miss your favorite teams on game season as it is home to the iconic Wrigley Field Baseball Stadium. Head on to Millenium and Lincoln Parks that cover a wide area of nature reserves, botanical landscapes, architecture and museums. Spend an afternoon strolling through the gardens or just taking in the view from the river cruise that gives you the closer perspective of Windy City’s iconic buildings and the Chicago skyline

Truly a delightful experience staying on this culture rich and diverse community.

-Bath towels are provided per number of guest not per number of stay
-Washcloths are not provided during your stay. You may send me a message though if you need them and I'll try my best to accommodate your request.
-We have duvet covers on our beddings  (no top sheets).
-A Security Deposit may be required on some bookings. 
-If there's an issue during your stay, please report it real time so we can address it right away.

- Street parking and meter parking is available nearby. But as it gets more difficult to park at night we recommend parking your car and take the train for your entire stay. The apartment is a 13-minute walk to the Addison train station.

access: The listing is for the entire apartment.
description:
Sunny and charming 2BR apt in historic 
Ukrainian Village (West Town). Vintage apt. with modern amenities: dishwasher, washer/dryer, Wi-Fi, smart TV, cable, central heat/AC. Easy & free street parking. Top floor of 3 floor walkup. Feels like home!

Great central location. Walk to great bars & restaurants. Close to highways & public transportation. 3 miles to downtown. 2 mi to heart of Wicker Park. 3 mi to the Mag Mile, Logan Square, Lincoln Park. 5 mi to Wrigley. Cheap Uber/Lyft rides!

Darling vintage apartment with great sunlight. Free and easy street parking is so rare in Chicago, we’ve got it right on Western Ave. Not the fanciest place but it has lots of charm, it’s affordable, comfortable and in a great central location. GREAT option for long term rentals and business professionals!

The listing is for the entire apartment.

Happy to answer questions via text or through the app. We are very quick to respond.

Easy street parking, no permit or meters. Cheap uber/Lyft rides to downtown!

We have a full coffee and tea bar! Regular coffee maker, keurig, french press, tea kettle and assortment!

additional_house_rules:
House Rules: Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.  
1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable. 
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property.

access: You'll have full access to my 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment.
description:
*SPECIAL* Jan-Feb Stay 7+ nights at 20% off OR 30+ at 25% off! 

My top-floor apartment in Bucktown is the perfect space for your trip to Chicago! It's a stylish, modern rehab in a classic Chicago building, so you really see the best of what the city has to offer! It's just off beautiful Holstein Park, and easy walking distance to 2 Blue Line stops - so you can get to the Loop in under a half hour! And plenty of Logan Square favorites along Milwaukee are a 15 minute walk away - book today!

My place is the top floor unit of a friendly building. From the unit's front door, you'll walk up another set of stairs, and into the open living room / kitchen. There's a TV in the living room with antenna channels and streaming options. Beyond the kitchen is the bathroom, and the bedroom. There's a TV in the bedroom as well.

You'll have full access to my 1 bedroom, 1 bath apartment.

Bucktown and Wicker Park are practically inseparable—the districts bleed into each other so seamlessly, it’s hard to know where one ends and the other begins. The neighborhoods have been the focus of two decades of steady development, and even as they become more accessible to young families and professionals, the neighborhoods maintain an innovative vibe. Thanks to established cultural institutions, walkable strips of galleries, boutiques, bars, and restaurants, Wicker Park and Bucktown continue to be a destination for creative types - and anyone looking for a nice time.

The Western Blue Line stop is about a half-mile / 10 minute walk south. The 49/Western and 74/Fullerton buses are nearby too, so it's easy to get around here without a car. If you do bring a car, however, there's plenty of street parking in the neighborhood.
house_rules:
House Rules: Very simply, please respect my home and my neighbors. Please read these rules carefully and take them seriously, failure to comply will result in forfeiture of your deposit and/or termination of your reservation without a refund.  
1.) No parties or additional overnight guests without prior approval. Noise disturbances reported by neighbors or police are unacceptable. 
2.) Please ensure you have left the premises and returned any keys issued to you by the agreed upon check out time. Failure to do so will result in a $250 late check-out fee. 
3.) No smoking (of anything) inside the unit or on building premises. Additionally, Chicago law prohibits smoking within 15 feet of any building entrance. 
4.) Please be respectful of my neighbors and be mindful of noise and loud music. Please observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM-8:00 AM daily. 
5.) Pets are not allowed at the property.

Thanks to established cultural institutions, walkable strips of galleries, boutiques, bars, and restaurants, Wicker Park and Bucktown continue to be a destination for creative types - and anyone looking for a nice time.

access: Guest will have access to everything in the apartment. We provide fresh fruits, juice, bottled water, and cereal for each guest. There is free parking and Netflix
description:
Huge, bright, clean, quiet, affordable 2 bedroom apartment with kitchen,living & bathroom. Very close to downtown/loop, close to parks & stadium. Easy access to buses and trains. Close to bars and restaurants. $0 sec deposit, WiFi,free parking, and Netflix!

Centrally located large 2 bedroom apartment with real beds and refrigerator, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, etc. Living room has a couch and TV with NetFlix. We provide an additional bedroom making it a 3 bedroom and additional air-mattresses if your team is large, we have hosted 12 people before. The space comfortable fits 10. See the reviews. 

The apartment is very close to downtown and great view of city from the top rear deck of the building. Affordable, clean, friendly, close proximity (1-5 min) to transportation such as buses and trains. Close to bars, restaurants, stadiums, points of interest such as Grant Park, Millennium Park, and McCormick Place. Night life and food is great!!! 

The price is the cheapest you can find in Chicago. This is because we enjoy hosting travelers and meeting exciting people from all over the world, being that we are international people ourselves this is extremely fun for us.

Free and available street parking and Free WiFi.

Several small/medium art museums in the neighborhood and the University Village and University of Illinois is a stone throw away.

Great view of the the city's skyline from rear deck

Access to roof, back porch, back yard, and a park with pool is 1 min away. 

Great and affordable food in the neighborhood

Close to lake Michigan

Number 8 bus (to Broadway-5 minute walk away), number 18 bus (to Michigan Avenue-1 minute walk away), and the pink line train are a few blocks away. The CTA number 9 and 60 buses are also 5 minutes away.

Guest will have access to everything in the apartment. We provide fresh fruits, juice, bottled water, and cereal for each guest. There is free parking and Netflix

I am busy, but surely finds time for my guests.

The food, drinks, and the people are great. The neighborhood is 10-15 minutes walk from most of the popular places. The apartment is close to numerous public transportation and public bike rental.

The apartment has its own private entrance

Number 8 bus (to Broadway-5 minute walk away), number 18 bus (to Michigan Avenue-1 minute walk away), and the pink line train are a few blocks away. The CTA number 9 and 60 buses are also 5 minutes away. 

DIVY bike stand is 2 minutes away.

Free WiFi, Netflix, Great neighborhood, Free and available street parking. 

The address is 1115 W 19th PLACE and not 1115 W 19th STREET. 19th STREET is one block from 19th PLACE.

access:
Guests have exclusive access to the apartment. Additionally, guests have access to the following building amenities:
Indoor pool 
Indoor hot tub
Fitness Center 
Seasonal outdoor deck
description:
Please note that photos are of a similar Domio unit in Chicago. The layout will be different, but will feature similar furniture and design.

Pair your Chicago experience with the perfect place to stay. Walking distance from some of Chicago's best areas, this gorgeous, stylish, and charming space was thoughtfully designed to capture local flair and create a relaxing environment. Whether traveling solo, with friends, or with family, see the best of art, culture, and cuisine that Chicago has to offer and have an unforgettable experience staying at this Domio.

This space exemplifies the Domio standard: uncompromising style and maximum comfort. This 2 bedroom and 2 bath home boasts an exquisite living room, luxury furniture, and premium finishes. In addition to a fully-stocked kitchen with professional grade appliances, guests will be pleased to find local decor and artwork throughout the home.

Bedroom 1:
Queen Bed

Bedroom 2:
Queen Bed

Guests have exclusive access to the apartment. Additionally, guests have access to the following building amenities:
Indoor pool 
Indoor hot tub
Fitness Center 
Seasonal outdoor deck

We do our best to tailor each experience to our guests preferences. Want advice, suggestions, or a shoulder to lean on? We are always available at your disposal. Need a place to stay but don't feel like chatting? That's okay too, we won't be offended.

Streeterville is one of Chicago's best neighborhoods and the perfect place to base your Chicago stay. This Domio is two blocks away from the spectacular John Hancock building and its famous 360 Chicago attraction and The Signature Room at the 95th. During the summer months, kick back at Oak Street Beach which is a quick stroll away. Additionally, Northwestern Memorial Hospital and Ann & Robert H Lurie Children's Hospital are less than a 10 minute walk away.

With a walkscore of 94, this Domio is conveniently located near many restaurants and attractions.
Nearest Bus Stop: Chestnut & Lake Shore Drive (157 bus) - 1 minute walk
Nearest Subway Stop: Chicago (Red Line) - 12 minute walk 
Closest Grocery Store: Potash Market - 5 minute walk

Chicago Registration: Pending

Please note that we do not allow bookings from residents of Chicago and surrounding areas.

description:
The unit has separate and private entry, including 3 bedrooms, living room, work space, kitchenette, laundry, central air, and a fully updated bath.    We will provide the makings for a continental breakfast - cereals, granola, baked goods, butter, jams, coffee & tea.

We are walking distance to the train,  1 mile to the lake, and 2 miles to Northwestern University Campus.

You'll love exploring all that Evanston has to offer, as well as quick access to Chicago.

We own the building and live in first floor unit and have transformed the garden apartment to accommodate travelers from near and far.

We respect your desire for privacy but also look forward to getting to know our guests.

Evanston - the "Brooklyn of Chicago" - is culturally rich and diverse, with amazing restaurants, galleries, boutiques, and scenery.  Enjoy the breathtaking lakefront of Lake Michigan and the stunning skyline of downtown Chicago.

Pretty much any and all transportation is available and easily accessible.  From local "L" and commuter Metra trains to quick access to Lake Shore Drive.  We also have a Divvy Bike station 2 blocks away.

access: Guests are welcome to access everything in the apartment :)
description:
Welcome! Here you will find a plentiful amount of charm & friendliness to help make for wonderful memories♡

You're well taken cared for with:
Fully stocked kitchen
Plenty of amenities
2 free parking spaces
Kreuger coffee
Smart TV's 
Netflix
A pleasant host :)

This 2 bedroom apt is on the 3rd floor of a quiet neighborhood. Coin laundry on the same floor. Library & bike path 2-3 blocks away.
17 mins to Ohare airport
25 mins to downtown Chicago
10 mins I-290, I-88 & 294

This sunny and well lit 2 bedroom apartment is on the 3rd floor of a 6 unit apartment complex.  The parking spaces are only a few feet away from entering the building. 
The coin laundry is on the same floor as the apartment.

Guests are welcome to access everything in the apartment :)

Guests can contact me any day at any hour :) Mostly though,  I tend to give my guests their space to enjoy their stay.

Overall a quiet and pleasant small chicago suburb :) Plenty of mom and pop stores nearby with larger shopping stores a short drive away.

There is one small locked hallway closet that is not available to guests.

description:
Private, quiet room for 3 people in the heart of Chicago with FREE PARKING & an EARLY check-in time! (12 pm). You will have your own door code and may arrive at ANY time you would like starting 12 p.m. and as late as you wish, EASY self check-in guaranteed. 

I allow LUGGAGE DROP OFF! You can store your luggage in the closet before check-in and after check-out times, you can drop it off and pick it up as early and as late as you would like. 

The neighborhood is extremely safe even at night :)

Restaurants and bars are right round the corner, both upscale and casual. This room is 6 minutes away by car or uber to Chicago's famous Willis (Sears) tower. Uber costs about $7. If you are arriving by car, I am providing free resident parking passes for anywhere in the area. (Yes, that means you can drive a few blocks and still park anywhere you want!)

The room will be ONLY yours for the time you'll stay in my Windy City. You will have a key to lock the door. 

> EARLY CHECK-IN TIME! (12 pm)

> QUIET ROOM, QUIET area!

> 3 people, air mattress is provided for 3rd person

> Free parking provided: park BEFORE your check-in and stay parked AFTER your check-out if you would like

> GREEN TEA & ALOE memory foam mattress

> 5 MIN to DOWNTOWN 

> Restaurants and bars are 5 MIN away walking distance 

> 5 MIN walk to PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION/METRO

> 3 MIN walk to UIC (University of Illinois at Chicago) 

> No security deposit

> Cancel up to 24 hours in advance to get a full refund

> Last minute reservations are welcome!

You will be given a door code to access the apartment and a key to lock your private room. You may arrive as late as you would like with my code entry. You may store your luggage in the closet BEFORE and AFTER check in so you don't have to haul your bags around the city. You will be able to view your check-in instructions under "House Manual" as soon as you confirm the booking. The door code will be sent to you 1 night prior to your arrival, or immediately if you have a last-minute reservation. I am also providing a folder full of recommendations for restaurants, nightlife and places to visit from the local, it will be on your bed upon arrival :)

100% of guests love my location- it is the best of both worlds: 5 minutes from the very center of downtown, yet quiet enough to not hear the noise at night. If you are still not convinced, please read my reviews.

The closest public transportation BLUE LINE is UIC HALSTED and is a 3 minute walk. It takes you to Willis Tower, Millenium Park and almost every other tourist destination in under 10 minutes!

We live right below on the 1st floor, so we have quiet hours set from 10:30pm-9am.
Campground rules: Please do not bring any extra guests onto the property, other than those who are included in the reservation.
We are a no shoes household- thin floors make stomping and shoe-wearing shake the whole house! Thank you, in advance!
If you smoke, please use the back deck & an ashtray. No smoking inside.

access: You have access to the whole upstairs, which includes two bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom, back porch, and driveway. We share the backyard, but you'll have a private back entrance, and your porch space is far above everything.
description:
Enjoy a quiet retreat in the trees in the top floor of this historic 100yr old farmhouse, only  one block away from the heart of one of Chicago's most exciting neighborhoods & the Blue Line! Just a quick train ride to all the sights in downtown & Ohare! The apt has been styled with vintage comfort in mind, to be a serene, creative, sun-filled space to come home to after a long day on the town. With so much going on just at the end of the block, we tend to keep things peaceful on this street.

This is Old-School Chicago! The unit features a full eat-in kitchen with a dishwasher (both of which are serious rarities in old Chicago places) & dining table set for 4. The living room has a TV  with a Google Chrome & Playstation 2 hooked up for dvds & games. Two bedrooms (both Queens), multiple AC units for the hot summer days, and central heat for chilly winters. The back porch or nearby Palmer Square Park are perfect for your morning coffee on a sunny day-- if not, we have multiple cozy cafes within a 3min walk, which we frequent.

You have access to the whole upstairs, which includes two bedrooms, living room, kitchen, bathroom, back porch, and driveway. We share the backyard, but you'll have a private back entrance, and your porch space is far above everything.

We like to respect our guests privacy, so you have your own entrance through the backyard. However, you might run into us  in the garden or on our lower level of the back porch! Feel free to ask any questions, or keep to yourselves-- Whatever you prefer for an enjoyable stay.

Logan Square is full of cafes, restaurants, bars, breweries, galleries & parks! Literally anything you could need is right here within a 10min walk-- maybe even a 2min walk! It has been a thriving artistic community for a long time, and has grown into somewhat of a destination spot in recent years because of its creative flair and bustling life, with a neighborhood feel.

It is easiest to get to us from O'hare-- about a 30min train ride straight from the inside of the airport to the California stop, only 1.5 blocks from the house! If you're coming from Midway, we are a very close highway, so Uber or Lyft makes that about a 40min drive-- or you could take the Orange Line to Clark/Lake, where you'll transfer to the Blue Line (headed to O'hare), and get off at the California Stop. This option takes about an hour.

Please let us know if you are driving/have a car, so we can make sure the driveway is available for your use. We live in the unit directly below you, and so we are of course understanding of normal noise levels with upstairs guests. But please try to refrain from shoes inside, stomping, moving furniture, and loud bass, for our benefit. Thank you!
house_rules:
We live right below on the 1st floor, so we have quiet hours set from 10:30pm-9am.
Campground rules: Please do not bring any extra guests onto the property, other than those who are included in the reservation.
We are a no shoes household- thin floors make stomping and shoe-wearing shake the whole house! Thank you, in advance!
If you smoke, please use the back deck & an ashtray. No smoking inside.
interaction: We like to respect our guests privacy, so you have your own entrance through the backyard. However, you might run into us  in the garden or on our lower level of the back porch! Feel free to ask any questions, or keep to yourselves-- Whatever you prefer for an enjoyable stay.

additional_house_rules:
****bookings without reviews will have to provide an ID via the Airbnb messaging system or at check in. LOCAL, one night stays must provide IDS of all guests via messaging system PRIOR to check in. 

NO UNAUTHORIZED GUESTS ALLOWED****  

NO SMOKING IN THE UNIT. $200 fine + cleaning fees.  

NO SHOES in the apartment (its a Japanese thing). We have provided slippers for you. It keeps the place cleaner. If you have a pet we can consider it based on a case to case basis but please contact me first.   

Please no one under 21 yrs old without a parent or guardian. Thank you.  

Please WASH any dishes you use. There will be a $25 extra fee for anything more than a few dishes left behind. Thank you.  

Please be HONEST about how many guests are staying. There is a surcharge for deception... just BE HONEST. The building has cameras! Additional guests without prior notification will be charged DOUBLE the nightly guest rate.    

ABSOLUTELY NO PARTIES... You will immediately forfeit your stay and not receive a refund. Thank you. *IF YOU ARE TRYING TO BE SLICK AND BOOK TO THROW A PARTY AND/OR THEN TRY TO CANCEL: I WILL KEEP WHATEVER MONEY YOU PAY PER THE CANCELLATION POLICY.   

For stays with children under 2 yrs old: The unit is not "baby proofed" but is suitable if the child is under constant supervision. 


 I want to preface the following by saying 95% of our guests leave our places in amazing condition. We are very understanding about small messes that may have been overlooked as I know I am by no means perfect. That being said the following is to address the 5% who may not understand quite how airbnb works yet.  

1. We are not a hotel.  
2. We are not your personal maids.   

While there is a cleaning fee, the fee is to cover changing of linens, washing of towels and "normal" cleaning of the kitchen, bathroom and living areas. What is not covered and WILL incur an extra fee are the following:   

1. A pile of dishes left in the sink (violates house rules)
2. Excessive kitchen messes such as cooking grease all over the stove. 
3. Excessive food on the floors (I dont mean a few crumbs-I mean it looked like someone was feeding pigeons). 
4. Chewing gum ground into the furniture (yes, that has actually happened). 
5. OBVIOUS wearing of shoes in the unit (we are a no-shoes house- see house rules) ie shoes foot prints, tracked in dirt and mud. 
 Anything else above and beyond what is considered "normal" cleaning.  
6. smoking in the unit will AUTOMATICALLY  incur a $200 fee.  
7. NO PETS. We have other units available that allow pets. please contact me about them. $100 fee if pets are found staying in the unit without prior consent.    

Again- this ISNT the majority of our guests and we understand things can be overlooked. Upon an "excessive cleaning" situation, I will not leave any review, I will simply send a request for an extra cleaning fee (usually around $25-50) depending on how much extra time it took to clean. Thank you for your understanding.

access: The entire building is accessible.
description:
BEST neighborhood in Chicago. The 1st real neighborhood west of all the high-rises, close to restaurants, shops and blue line. Two units available for your group. Two kitchens and bathrooms. High quality memory foam mattresses, 1000tc sheets and duvets, IN UNIT laundry, Kuerig coffeemakers, microwaves, stoves, fridges and stocked kitchens. CENTRAL AIR CONDITIONING. Sleeps up to 13 people but really a perfect size for 9. Plenty of FREE street parking too! *NOT CORPORATE OWNED

Two Airbnbs available in the same building! Great for large families or business trips where you want to stay in close proximity to one another. both units are two bedrooms with one bath. Both kitchens are fully stocked with full size appliances and laundry. Central air conditioning is also available in both units. Both units have a flat screen TV with Netflix and Hulu. there is also an Amazon Alexa and a Samsung soundbar for your musical needs.
Sleeping arrangements: one unit has TWO bedrooms with queen size beds. ONE fold down couch that one person can sleep on. ONE air mattress. The second floor unit has two bedrooms, one with a queen size bed and the other with FULL size bunks with a trundle. An air mattress can also be used in the dining area.

The entire building is accessible.

I can be as available as needed. I don't live far from the unit and about 10 min away.

Located in the fantastic neighborhood of "Noble Square" conveniently located close to tourist sites, downtown, and restaurant row. Uber is very inexpensive and the Chicago blue line stop is a 7 min walk away. Great restaurants, Starbucks and parks are all located within walking distance.

Uber, Lyft, Chicago blue line, Grand Ave bus and your own car are great ways to get around. Plenty of free street parking available and permitted parking as well.

description:
Welcome to Garfield House - an amazing historic Westside property w/enclosed front porch and roomy back yard. Well situated across from a park with easy L, bus, or ride-share access to downtown. Four spacious bedrooms, several gathering places, a large kitchen and dining room. Parties are not permitted but small gatherings may be approved.  Great space for families.  The host resides on the third floor and shares the kitchen.  Please acquaint yourself with the house rules to ensure a good fit.

I will be available primarily through texting but I do reside on the 3rd floor.  My goal is to provide guests privacy but to be available to answer their questions and to ensure an awesome experience at Garfield House.

We face the amazing downtown skyline, a large park, and are a short walk from the Garfield Conservatory which is free and open every day.

additional_house_rules:
House Rules

1. Reservations require a $400 security deposit that is not charged in advance.

2. Guests can cancel free of charge within 24 hours of booking (please contact us to process the refund). You’ll be charged 50% of the booking price (minus the service fee) if you cancel more than seven days before arrival, and 100% of the total price if you cancel within seven days of arrival.

3. Check-in is at 4 pm. Checkout is at 11 am. Early check-in or late checkout may be available upon request. Guests who stay beyond their designated checkout time or delay our housekeeping staff are liable for any associated costs and expenses.

4. Guests are not allowed to make a reservation in their city of residence. Please contact us if you're booking within your city.

5. Smoking, parties, and excessive noise are not allowed, including on balconies and in shared spaces. Smoking violations are subject to a $250 fine plus the cost to clean, deodorize, and repair damages.

6. Commercial photography/videography without written consent, Illegal activity, prostitution, and possession of firearms is strictly prohibited.

7. Overnight guests that exceed the number stated in the reservation are not allowed.

8. Pets are not allowed. Violation of our pet policy may result in a fine. We encourage guests with service animals to contact us before their stay.

9. Guests are responsible for covering the cost to replace lost keys, key cards, fobs, or parking passes.

10. Sonder properties may use video surveillance in public areas. Noise detecting technology may be used inside the suite to monitor excessive noise levels. 

11. Guests take full responsibility for damages, injury, or loss that occur on the premises and its facilities. Guests must report any property damage to customer service. Unreported damages will be deducted from the security deposit.

12. Booking a reservation constitutes an agreement to comply with the House Rules. Guests who violate these rules are liable for any associated damages, fees, costs, or expenses.

description:
Featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and Fast Company, we’ve hosted over 350k guests in 2,500+ spaces with an average rating of 4.6 stars. Each space is designed and run by us, so you’ll always know what to expect from your stay. At Sonder, we’ve combined the best parts of home and hotel.

- 24/7 support via text, email, or phone
- Coffee, fresh towels, and bathroom essentials provided
- Hotel-standard cleaning before you arrive
- Self check-in

- Fully-equipped kitchen 

Building amenities
- Laundry facilities

South Loop highlights
- Walkability score: 95
- 4 minute walk to Yolk (our favorite brunch spot)
- 4 minute walk to Flo & Santos (delicious pizzeria and pub)

Getting around
- 1 minute walk to Roosevelt Station 
- 5 minute drive to downtown
- 30 minute drive to MDW Airport
- 54 minute drive to ORD Airport

The South Loop is a vibrant blend of notable attractions, beautiful parks, and stunning Lake Michigan views. Picnic in the charming green space surrounding Museum Campus, or attend one of the many events at Grant Park such as The Taste of Chicago. Spend the day exploring the countless museums, or journey to the top of the 108-story Willis Tower for breathtaking views of the city.

This is a central location and prone to noise.
